name: SkyHacker
description:
This is a  game  and it's extremely hard to win .... I am the developer of this game and even I, I find it  very hard to finish  ....

In the game you need  to hack all the city with the help of a mobile-phone, but be careful because the police is coming for you ...

-the places to hack are marked with "X"

-the police starts chasing you for 2 minutes after  one minute of break.

Controls:

KEYSACTIONSWASDmovingEhackLeft-clickuse the flamethrowerShiftSprintSpaceJump

Thanks for playing !
